title: Bjack's Blog Post
content: I like Call of Duty, Rocket League, and anime. I also enjoy streetwear and cool hats. I am sneakerhead and I would give up food and water for shoes if it was a valid possibility. Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Koyoharu Gotouge. It follows teenage Tanjiro Kamado, who strives to become a demon slayer after his family was slaughtered and his younger sister, Nezuko, turned into a demon.
